main.name: Piotr Gorski
main.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, GitHub, SASS, Bootstrap and more..
main.bio: Aspiring Software Developer with a master's degree in Electrical Engineering and 3 years of experience commissioning and maintaining machinery in the automation/logistics industry. As a self-taught developer, I took advantage of my free time during the pandemic to complete a Front End Development Course and build multiple web applications. Now looking for a role where I can continue learning and do what I am passionate about: coding.

education.description: 225 hours of classes in the form of practical workshops preparing for work as a Front-End Developer. A range of topics: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, jQuery, RWD, Bootstrap, AJAX, SASS, GIT, WordPress.

education.degree: Master of Science in Electrical Engineering
Bachelor of Science in Power Engineering

work.title: Residence Maintenance Engineer
work.description: Day-to-day engineering maintenance of the fully automated logistic centre, providing technical expertise, improving, and solving system problems.

work.title: PLC Programmer / Commissioning engineer
work.description: Commissioning and testing of the SSI Carrier System. Documentation of commissioning progress. Programming and optimisation of existing software concepts. Performing on-site performance tests.
